name: RestExpress
tagline: The easiest way to create and maintain RESTful web services in Java.
body:
RestExpress is the easiest way to create RESTful web services in Java.  An extremely Lightweight, Fast, REST Engine and API for Java.  Supports JSON and XML serialization automagically as well as ISO 8601 date formats.  A thin wrapper on Netty IO HTTP handling, RestExpress lets you create performant, stand-alone REST web services rapidly.  Works 'expressly' well with Syntaxe, RepoExpress and OAuthExpress.

### Authors and Contributors
Todd Fredrich (@tfredrich)
